about_the_game:
Embark on an adventure to asend to the top of slimeciety and cure the world of a curse to keep the hierarchy in place! You take control of a humanoid slime who is trying to overcome their own insecurities while saving all slimes from a grim and pre-destined life.

* Explore an alien yet familiar world inhabited by slimes and other creatures.

* Ascend from near the bottom to the very top of the capital city named Slimtopia, uncovering the story behind how slimeciety was built and preserved.

* Overcome the past and defy the future in your journey.

* Precision platforming using either Keyboard and Mouse OR Controller.

* Many platforming skills, some of which you unlock as you progress including; Walljump, Double Jump, Ground Stomp and Recoil Jump.

* Use the enviroment to your advantage navigate levels quicker.

* Hidden collectables in levels to unlock a HardMode version of the level.

The game is currently in a very early state. While the base mechanics are in (barring a few tweaks from feedback), expect to see:

* Potential additional mechanics.

* An overhaul of some of the art + all new art.

* A more suitable soundscape.

* Additional songs.

* Additional levels.

* A more fleshed out story with additional cutscenes and dialouges.
